mapper.select: select comment.commentid,comment.text,comment.likes,comment.createtime,user.userid,user.name,user.cover from comment join user on comment.userid=user.userid and comment.keyid=#{keyid} and comment.type=#{type} order by ${types} DESC limit 7
mapper.insert: insert into comment(userid, keyid, type, text, createtime) values (#{userid},#{keyid},#{type},#{text},#{createtime});
mapper.update: update `comment` set likes = likes + 1 where commentid = #{commentId}
